 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package analyser

Interface Summary
Tag The interface Tag contains constants that represent tags for words and suffixes
 

Class Summary
ADictionary  
Analyser The class Analyser contains methods for analysing the given word.
AuxiliaryVerb The class Auxillary contains methods for checking whether the input ends with an auxillary.
BooleanMethod The class BooleanMethod contains methods for checking whether the input ends with a particular suffix for example case, oblique.
BTree Balanced Tree Implementation class which extends AbstractSet and implements Set.
BTree.Entry Inner class to hold the node elements.
ByteMeth The class ByteMeth contains methods which operate on byte arrays, for example concatinating two arrays
Case The class Case contains methods for checking whether the input ends with a 'case marker'.
Clitic The class Clitic contains methods for checking whether the input ends with a 'clitic'.
Constant Class contains Tamil suffixes
Entry Class to hold the analysed output.
FileLocator Load images from correct place (directory or JAR file) into GUI.
Infinity The class Infinity contains methods for checking whether the input ends with a 'Infinitive suffix'.
Method The class Method contains methods for analysing the input string
Misc The class contains methods Miscellaneous functions like merging two stacks
Noun The class contains methods to check whether the input falls under noun inflection
NounMisc The class contains methods for checking whether the input ends with any ajectival/adverbial suffixes
PNG The class contains methods for checking whether the input ends with a 'Person-Number-Gender marker'.
Postposition The class Postposition contains methods for checking whether the input ends with 'Postposition'.
RelativeParticiple The class RelativeParticiple contains methods for checking whether the input ends with 'Relative Participle suffix'.
Sandhi The class Sandhi contains methods for checking Sandhi rules
SingPluralMarker The class contains methods for checking whether the input ends with any Singular or Plural Marker
TabConverter Used to convert the TAB text in to the internal code and vise versa.
Tense The class Tense contains methods for checking whether the input ends with 'Tense Marker'.
Verb The class contains methods to check whether the input falls under verb inflection
VerbalParticiple The class VerbalParticiple contains methods for checking whether the input ends with 'Verbal Participle suffix'.
VerbMisc The class contains methods for checking whether the input ends with any imperative markers, finite verb, etc
